text: A Flash of Light is a 1910 American silent drama movie directed by D. W. GriffithA Flash of LightScott Simmon. The Films of D. W. Griffith and stars Charles West, Vivian Prescott, and Stephanie Longfellow. ==Actors== * Charles West as John Rogers * Vivian Prescott as Belle * Stephanie Longfellow as The Older Sister * Verner Clarges as The Father * Joseph Graybill as Horace Dooley * Dorothy Bernard * William J. Butler as A Doctor * Charles Craig as Wedding Guest * Edward Dillon as At First Party * John T. Dillon as At First Party / At Second Party (as Jack Dillon) * Ruth Hart as At Second Party ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1910 drama movies Category:American drama movies Category:American silent movies Category:Movies directed by D. W. Griffith
title: A Flash of Light (movie)
